thread.title: Windows add support for the North Korea time zone on October 20
thread.title_full: Windows will add support for the North Korea time zone on October 20 - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Windows add support for the North Korea time zone on October 20
text: North Korean Windows fans, rejoice! Microsoft announced today that a Windows update coming on Oct. 20 will allow Windows users to align their PCs with the recently announced North Korea time zone. “Democratic People’s Republic of Korea has implemented its own time zone with UTC +8:30,” Microsoft wrote today in a short post on its […] »
